summary: This document is a chain of internal FBI emails from July 7-8, 2020, discussing the arrest and detention of Ghislaine Maxwell. The emails confirm her transfer to the Metropolitan Detention Center in Brooklyn and coordinate updates on her bail hearing and potential new victims.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the email chain; discussed regarding her transfer to the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) in Brooklyn and her upcoming bail hearing.

events.title: Maxwell transferred to MDC Brooklyn
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell was transferred to the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) in Brooklyn.

events.title: Potential bail hearing (initially scheduled)
events.description: Maxwell was expected to have a bail hearing on Friday, July 10, 2020, but it was noted this could be moved.

events.title: Bail hearing rescheduled
events.description: An email update states the bail hearing will be on Tuesday, July 14, 2020.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was transferred to the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) in Brooklyn on July 6, 2020.
Her bail hearing was initially anticipated for July 10, 2020, but was later scheduled for July 14, 2020.
The emails are internal FBI correspondence, showing coordination within the Crimes Against Children and Human Trafficking Unit regarding the case.
An inquiry was made about whether any new victims had come forward following Maxwell's arrest.
The correspondence indicates an intent to prepare a Situational Information Report (SCN) to disseminate details about Maxwell's detention and legal proceedings.
